Comment 2: 
For clarity, for this program:

package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
        length := (1 << 63) - 1
        a := make([]struct{}, length)
        b := make([]struct{}, length)
        a = append(a, b...)
        fmt.Println(len(a), cap(a))
}

"go run" prints "-2 -2".  When built with gccgo, it crashes with a "append: slice
overflow" panic.
